tag_list: 3mindware, , computer-services, web-design, graphics-design, web-design-services, miami, web-site-design, website-designer, professional-website-design, computer-repair, pc-repair, networking, computer-networking, pc-networking, spyware, virus-removal, we
overview: 3MINDWARE is an experienced web design firm capable of handling projects of any size. 3MINDWARE has everything you need such as customer-focused web sites, graphics designs and computer services. We pride ourselves on being very knowledgeable in all aspects of computer repair, including pc repair, networking, computer networking, network installations, spyware and virus removal, data recovery, DSL Internet installation and network / Internet consulting. In graphics and web design 3MINDWARE INC prides itself on superior design, first-class customer service, and unequalled value. In addition we maintain a closely knit, passionate team of professional designers and developers who work tirelessly to deliver the finest work available. 3MINDWARE takes great pleasure in collaborating with its clients to develop comprehensive integrated solutions that deliver bottom line results. Our objective is to build websites that are effective. As such, we also can provide corporate identity, brand definition, professional website design, SEO (search engine optimization), web maintenance, and multimedia solutions. 3MINDWARE has everything you need and expect from a full-service website design company. We are at the forefront of the ever-evolving interactive landscape and are helping to redefine how brands succeed online. We help our clients to become leaders of business trends, rather than reacting to them. Our business does not think in terms of interactive solutions, rather we think in terms of business building. Our experience allows us to better understand the needs of our clients with a unique perspective that is not limited to one or two vertical markets. 3MINDWARE INC also prides itself on working, sharing valuable knowledge and expertise with companies, both large and small.
